statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, gender, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE behavior LIKE '%loyal%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, behavior FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT id, age, location FROM customers WHERE behavior LIKE 'active%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND behavior LIKE '%engaged%'
SELECT id, name, gender FROM customers WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_location FROM Customers WHERE customer_age < 25 ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_location FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM Customers JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_color FROM preferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC, gender, location;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT customers.name, demographics.income, preferences.favorite_food FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id INNER JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE demographics.income > 50000 AND preferences.favorite_food = 'Pizza';

SELECT customers.name, demographics.education_level, preferences.preferred_brand FROM customers LEFT JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id LEFT JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE demographics.education_level IN ('Bachelor', 'Master', 'PhD') ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT customers.name, demographics.income, preferences.favorite_color FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id INNER JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE demographics.income BETWEEN 40000 AND 80000 OR preferences.favorite_color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT demo_id, income, education FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT behavior_id, website_visits FROM behaviors ORDER BY website_visits DESC;
SELECT pref_id, preferred_product, marketing_channel FROM preferences WHERE email_opt_in = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, location FROM customers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT c.name, d.income, b.website_visits FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id;
SELECT p.preferred_product, p.marketing_channel, c.location FROM preferences p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE p.email_opt_in = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price, purchase_date FROM Purchases ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, employment_status, location FROM Demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT name, age, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM Purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, income, location FROM Demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, browsing_history, interaction_count FROM Behaviors WHERE interaction_count > 50 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, marketing_email, preferred_products FROM Preferences WHERE marketing_email = true ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
